spells.name: Age Line
spells.effect: Prevents people above or below a certain age from access to a target

spells.name: Launch an object up into the air
Hex that grows antlers on the head
Anti-Disapparition Jinx
spells.effect: Prevents Disapparition within a certain area

spells.name: Tracking spell
spells.effect: Reveals traces of magic, including footprints and track marks

spells.name: Arrow-shooting spell
spells.effect: Fires arrows from the caster's wand

spells.name: Avifors Spell
spells.effect: Transforms the target into a bird.

spells.name: Badgering
spells.effect: Turns target human into a badger

spells.name: Bewitched Snowballs
spells.effect: Charms snowballs to follow and harass a designated target

spells.name: Broom jinx
spells.effect: Makes a broomstick attempt to buck its rider off

spells.name: Bubble-producing spell
spells.effect: Creates a stream of non-bursting bubbles

spells.name: Seize and Pull Charm
spells.effect: Pull caster towards object, Pull object towards caster

spells.name: Caterwauling Charm
spells.effect: Sets off a high-pitched shriek if entered

spells.name: Cauldron to Sieve
spells.effect: Turns a cauldron into a sieve

spells.name: Cauldron to badger
spells.effect: Transforms a cauldron into a badger.

spells.name: Cribbing Spell
spells.effect: Assists the caster in cheating on written papers.

spells.name: Drought Charm
spells.effect: Dries up small bodies of water

spells.name: Everte Statum
spells.effect: Makes opponent stumble, Causes sharp pain

spells.name: False memory charm
spells.effect: Implants a false memory in the victim

spells.name: Flagrante Curse
spells.effect: Causes objects to burn on contact

spells.name: Fur spell
spells.effect: Causes fur to grow on someone

spells.name: Hair-thickening Charm
spells.effect: Causes hair to grow longer and thicker

spells.name: Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx
spells.effect: Causes boils to spell "SNEAK" on the face of a traitor

spells.name: Homing spell
spells.effect: Offensive spells; will follow their target

spells.name: Homonculous Charm
spells.effect: When cast onto a map, it enables to track the movements of every person in the mapped area

spells.name: Homorphus Charm
spells.effect: May temporarily change a transformed werewolf back into their human form (according to Gilderoy Lockhart, it cures lycanthropy)

spells.name: Horn tongue hex
spells.effect: Transforms target's tongue into a horn

spells.name: Horton-Keitch Braking Charm
spells.effect: Allow broomsticks to brake more easily

spells.name: Horcrux-making spell
spells.effect: Prepared a receptacle to become a Horcrux

spells.name: Hurling Hex
spells.effect: Unclear, possibly causes a broomstick to attempt to hurl its rider off.

spells.name: Freezing Charm
spells.effect: Stops movement and actions of the target

spells.name: Intruder Charm
spells.effect: Detects intruders and sounds an alarm

spells.name: Langlock
spells.effect: Sticks tongue to roof of the mouth

spells.name: Legilimency Spell
spells.effect: Lets caster see into the mind of another person

spells.name: Meteolojinx Recanto
spells.effect: Causes weather effects caused by incantations to cease

spells.name: Ministry of Magic Fog
spells.effect: Produces special fog (for concealment of certain locations)

spells.name: Orbis Jinx
spells.effect: Sucks the target into the ground

spells.name: Patented Daydream Charm
spells.effect: Makes the user daydream for 30 minutes

spells.name: Reverse Spell
spells.effect: Shows the previous spells cast by a wand

spells.name: Shield Charm
spells.effect: Reflects spells and blocks physical forces
spells.light: Invisible on its own, reflects light of spell

spells.name: Protego Diabolica
spells.effect: Ring of protective black fire that only burns the caster's enemies whilst leaving their allies unharmed

spells.name: Pus-squirting hex
spells.effect: Causes yellowish goo to squirt from one's nose

spells.name: Reverte
spells.effect: Returns objects to their original positions or states

spells.name: Reparifarge
spells.effect: Reverses the effects of an incomplete Transformation spell

spells.name: Repello Inimicum
spells.effect: Repels enemies. If used with Protego Maxima and Fianto Duri, it disintegrates anything that comes in contact with the barrier.

spells.name: Revelio Charm
spells.effect: Reveals secrets about a person or object

spells.name: Boggart-Banishing Spell
spells.effect: Turns a Boggart into something amusing

spells.name: Rose Growth
spells.effect: Accelerates the growth of a rosebush

spells.name: Rowboat spell
spells.effect: Causes a rowboat to propel itself.

spells.name: Sea urchin jinx
spells.effect: Makes tiny spikes erupt all over the victim

spells.name: Shield penetration spell
spells.effect: Used to break down magical shields

spells.name: Skurge Charm
spells.effect: Cleans ectoplasm, Frightens ghosts and other spirits

spells.name: Sonorous Charm
spells.effect: Emits a magnified roar from the tip of the wand

spells.name: Specialis Revelio
spells.effect: Reveals spells cast on objects or potions

spells.name: Sponge-Knees Curse
spells.effect: Causes the target's legs to become spongy

spells.name: Taboo
spells.effect: When a word is spoken, the caster is alerted and protective enchantments around the speaker are weakened.

spells.name: Teacup to tortoise
spells.effect: Transforms a teacup into a tortoise

spells.name: Teapot to tortoise
spells.effect: Transforms a teapot into a tortoise

spells.name: Toenail-growing hex
spells.effect: Causes its victim's toenails to grow alarmingly fast

spells.name: Transmogrifian Torture
spells.effect: Tortures, possibly by transfiguring the target to death

spells.name: Unbreakable Vow
spells.effect: Magical vow that is fatal if broken

spells.name: Unsupported flight
spells.effect: Allows a witch or wizard to fly unaided

spells.name: Vacuum cleaner spell
spells.effect: Cleans an object like a vacuum cleaner

spells.name: Ventus Duo
spells.effect: Creates a stronger jet of wind compared to Ventus

spells.name: Verdillious
spells.effect: Causes the wand tip to burn like a sparkler whilst damaging the foe.

spells.name: Verdimillious Charm
spells.effect: Emits green sparks from the wand that can: Do damage to opponents , Reveal hidden things

spells.name: Verdimillious Duo Spell
spells.effect: Emits green sparks from the wand that can: Do damage to opponents , Reveal hidden things

spells.name: Vulnera Sanentur
spells.effect: Slows blood flow, Clears residue, Knits wounds
